    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>690</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Bible</string>
            <string language="es">La Biblia</string>
            <string language="ga">An Bíobla</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Bibel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Bible</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Bible</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bibbia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η Βίβλος</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A quiz on the book they call The Bible - The Most Read Book in the World</string>
            <string language="es">Un cuestionario sobre el libro que llamamos La Biblia – el libro más leído del mundo</string>
            <string language="ga">Tráth na gceist faoin mBíobla - an Leabhar is mó Léimh ar Domhan</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Religion</string>
            <string language="es">Religión</string>
            <string language="ga">Reiligiún</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Quiz auf dem Buch benennen sie die Bibel - 
das gelesene Buch in der Welt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un jeu sur le livre ils appellent la bible - le 
livre le plus lu au monde</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um quiz no livro chamam o bible - o livro o mais 
lido no mundo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un quiz sul libro chiamano la bibbia - il libro 
più colto nel mondo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας διαγωνισμός γνώσεων στο βιβλίο καλούν τη Βίβλο 
- το διαβασμένο βιβλίο στον κόσμο</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Religião</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Religione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θρησκεία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
